info.tooltip.item.electriccraft.super_so: This gun is using the energy and pulling the energy from the air
and compressed it down to around 30,000 PSI, and it so
powerful that it can even shoot the enderman in just one shot.
death.attack.super_sonic_gun: %1$s was shot by Super Sonic Gun
create.ponder.tag.electric_craft.descrip: A mod that add electric stuff to minecraft.
create.ponder.electric_alloy_smelter.tex: Electric Alloy Smelter is a machine used to combine different materials.
It uses electrical energy or a rotational energy.
By placing an energy source block near it, It will now recives the energy and start operating.
By right clicking on any side but not the front with the shaft, It will now recives the kinetic energy and start operating.
